name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
I unilaterally announced that I have reconciled with the Little Pinks. I will not argue with them anymore. If I do, you will report me. If you come to my comment section in the future, I will block you and stop talking to you. The best ending for both of us is to forget about it.
“I just said that one million people died in the United States and the Twitter user broke down and blocked me. Where is the freedom of speech?”
Hello, that’s right.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:

At the invitation of Premier Li Keqiang, German Federal Chancellor Scholz will pay an official visit to China on November 4.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Fear is the support rate
As long as the epidemic exists in China, the people will thank Xi Jinping for personally deploying and directing the dynamic zero-clearance policy to save them
Once the epidemic is over, everyone will start to settle economic accounts with Xi Jinping.
So the dead end now is more tortuous-I am afraid that the zero-clearance policy will not be ended before the economy recovers. But if the zero-clearance policy is not ended, the economy will not recover.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Regarding the matter of the University of Science and Technology of China, I actually don’t like the term “death train”. It is very exaggerated for students to use the term “death train” to exaggerate the danger they face, because Omicron is not lethal at all.
I think this term itself still comes from the students’ fear of the new coronavirus, and the students’ appeal is that they hope that the relevant departments can control them, not freedom.
But in fact, sealing them on the train now is “controlling them”

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
So some students want me to speak out for the "death train", but I don't know how to speak out
I agree with the term "death train", which is equivalent to listing those students who are unfortunately infected with positive on the train as the culprits.
But in fact, letting you take the train and transfer to Baotou is just to make Hohhot clear the number of cases as soon as possible, that's all. In the eyes of the government, you are no different from positive, and you are both threats to political achievements.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @albert61856987 If it’s blocked, I hope they can control it. If it’s not blocked, they will just increase the intensity.
